solution.text:
Surface area of ceiling\(=\)Length \(\times\) Breadth
\(=_{j}_ \times _{k}_\)
\(=_{{j*k}}_ sq.ft.\)
Rate of painting per sq.ft.\(=\) Rs.\(20\)
Therefore, total painting cost\(=\)Surface area of ceiling \(\times\) Rate of painting
\(=_{{j*k}}_ \times 20 = _{{j*k*20}}_\) rupees

content.text: What will be the total cost of painting the ceiling at Rs.\(20\) per sq.ft.?
